privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your privacy

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
items: Health information (mood tracking, diary entries, crisis plans)
Biometric data (fingerprints, facial recognition) for authentication only

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Secure authentication (biometric data never leaves your device)

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell or share your personal health information. We may share information only:
items: In emergency situations to protect your safety
With service providers under strict confidentiality agreements

sections.title: 4. Data Security
items: Secure data storage with regular backups
Limited access on a need-to-know basis
Biometric data stored locally on device only

sections.title: 6. HIPAA Compliance
sections.content: As a mental health application, we are committed to HIPAA compliance and protecting your Protected Health Information (PHI) according to federal regulations.

sections.title: 7. Contact Us
sections.content:
For privacy concerns or questions, contact our Privacy Officer at: 
privacy@mindwise-dbt.com

securityNote.title: Your Data is Secure
securityNote.description: All information is encrypted and stored securely.
